summary: A documentary about the "King of B-Movies", Edgar G. Ulmer. It includes interviews with well-known filmmakers Roger Corman, Peter Bogdanovich, Wim Wenders, Joe Dante, and Ulmers's daughter, Arianne Ulmer.
cast: Peter Bogdanovich|Christian Cargnelli|John Carradine|Robert Clarke|Roger Corman|Joe Dante|Margaret Field|Stefan Grissemann|Alexander Horwath|Noah Isenberg|Boris Karloff|Hedy Lamarr|John Landis|Jimmy Lydon|Gregory W. Mank|Peter Marshall|Tom Neal|Michael Omasta|Michael Palm|Jean Parker|George Sanders|Ann Savage|John Saxon|William Schallert|Betta St. John|Arianne Ulmer|Edgar G. Ulmer|Tom Weaver|Wim Wenders
keywords: interview|new york city|ellis island new york city|period in title|poverty row film
title: Edgar G. Ulmer: The Man Off-Screen
